WTF Injury?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2010 Topics (Year of the Shock Rock): WTF Injury?
By JamesDH99 on Wednesday, August 11, 2010 - 11:10 am:

Hey, I was playing MRDS and I just got my newest monster to the A
rank, but no defeats, no hits, none of that and guess what? He still
gets injured! O____O What is that about?

By Rahu on Wednesday, August 11, 2010 - 12:30 pm:

What was your monster's fatigue and weight before and after the tournement?

By JamesDH99 on Wednesday, August 11, 2010 - 02:05 pm:

Rahu: He was normal weighted and it was feeling great. It's just so
weird.

By fiffa46 on Wednesday, August 11, 2010 - 02:41 pm:

I have noticed that on my monster who was also normal weight and feeling great (and I fed him a fatigue and stress reducer before the tourney) that he got KO'd in one of the fight but went on to win the rest and got injured. I've not had that happen in previous game so I was really confused.

By JamesDH99 on Wednesday, August 11, 2010 - 02:52 pm:

fiffa46: Well, about mine though is that I didn't feed him anything. I
just saved and immediately went to the tournament. My monster
won the whole match and he still got injured, but then I come to
find out that when he came back that he was spoiled.

One of mine got injured by losing one match as well. I think it's
safe to say don't lose or you're gonna get bitten.
